snippet.title: The Fortress of Dr. Radiaki - 2023 Re-Release Trailer
snippet.description:
The Fortress of Dr. Radiaki is exclusive to ZOOM Platform!

Click here to purchase for only $5.99!: https://www.zoom-platform.com/product/the-fortress-of-dr-radiaki

The Fortress of Dr. Radiaki is a thrilling first-person shooter adventure mixing carnage with a cutting edge sense of humor. You will confront scores of different adversaries, including sword wielding samurai, stealthy ninja warriors, robots with toasters for heads, mutated alligators and more. You must use all your wits to find your way through the cavernous fortress and defeat the Machiavellian designs of the horribly twisted Dr. Radiaki!

© This game is powered by Jordan Freeman Group’s ZOOM Platform Technology. A game originally developed by Future Visionary and Maelstorm Software. Published by Lee Jacobson and Jordan Freeman Group, LLC (DBA: ZOOM Platform). © 1994, 2023 Lee Jacobson and Jordan Freeman Group, LLC (DBA: ZOOM Platform) – All Rights Reserved.
